lesson_info.title: Descriptive Statistics
lesson_info.description: Measures of central tendency and spread

learning_objectives: Understand the fundamental concepts and principles of Descriptive Statistics
Apply Descriptive Statistics techniques in practical, real-world scenarios
Analyze the relationship between Descriptive Statistics and other topics in Statistical Analysis and Visualization
Evaluate the effectiveness of different approaches to Descriptive Statistics
Create solutions using Descriptive Statistics methodologies and best practices
